Anonymous

[Report] Image search: [Google]

Antz is commie Jew shit about a kike rapist ant who leads a revolution against a Hitler ant (pic related is an implicit Holocaust reference contained in the third act) and completely destroys/upturns his own society because he feels alienated.

A Bug's Life is pro-monarchy enduring Western epic about master strategies in war, deception, fighting for your country and using your own ingenuity, industriousness and inventiveness to throw off the parasite invader barbarians who are plaguing your land.

Antz is about a weak parasite subverting his own society and destroying it in the process of chasing his idealist delusions about a utopia ('Insectpia'). A Bug's Life is abut securing your future, your race and people for the coming generations and doing your duty to defend your civilization (Flik at numerous points in the film mentions how he will fail his descendants if he loses).

>>68630346

just looked up the whole casting list, pretty impressive:

>Woody Allen as Z-4195 "Z", an individualistic but meek worker ant.

>Gene Hackman as General Mandible, the manipulative and deluded supreme commander of the ant military.

>Sharon Stone as Princess Bala, the Queen Ant's daughter.

>Sylvester Stallone as Corporal Weaver, a strong soldier ant and Z's best friend.

>Jennifer Lopez as Azteca, another friend of Z's and a worker ant who becomes Weaver's girlfriend.

>Christopher Walken as Colonel Cutter, a flying ant that serves as Mandible's moral and intelligent advisor who starts to question the general's actions.

>Danny Glover as Staff sergeant Barbatus, a soldier ant who befriends Z.

Anne Bancroft as Queen Ant, Princess Bala's mother and the ruler of the ants.

>Dan Aykroyd as Chip the Wasp, a wasp who Z befriends.

>Grant Shaud as The Foreman, the head of the worker ants.

>John Mahoney as Grebs, the Drunk Scout.
